Little Richard Rock Set List

Set list for a Little Richard Rock Set.

Home      Youtube Playlist

Slippin’ And Slidin’ by Little Richard. #33 in USA and #2 on R&B charts in 1956. Also a big hit in UK.

CHORUS: E Slippin’ and a-slidin’, peepin’ and a-hidin,’ E7 Been told a long time ago. A Slippin’ and a-slidin’, peepin’ and a-hidin,’ E Been told a long time ago. B A I’ve been told, baby, you’ve been bold, E B B7 And I’ll be your fool, no more.

VERSE1: E Oh, big conniver, nothin’ but a jiver, E7 I done got hip to your jive. A Oh, big conniver, nothin’ but a jiver, E Done got hip to your jive. B A Slippin’ and a-slidin’, peepin’ and a-hidin,’ E B B7 And I’ll be your fool no more.

VERSE2: E Oh, Melinda, she’s a solid sender, E7 You know you better surrender. A Oh, Melinda, she’s a solid sender, E You know you better surrender. B A Slippin’ and slidin’, peepin’ and hidin,’ E B B7 And I’ll be your fool no more. CHORUS:(x2)
